channel.title: amplifiers on Bythos

item.title: OME MODUS
item.description: High Class Audio Power Amplifier Power output is 100 watts RMS into a 8Ω load and 140 watts into 4Ω load, before the onset of clipping. A particular feature of the MODUS is low distortion. Circuit description Now let’s have a look at the circuit of Fig.1. 16 transistors and two diodes make up the semiconductor complement. The input signal is coupled via a 2,2µF polypropylene capacitor (MKP) and 470Ω resistor to the base of Q1.
